name: Gimme Some Space | GMTK Jam 2021
description:
Gimme Somme Space is a top-down spaceship game made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

Controls: Space button (X on DualShock or A on Xbox Controller) to swap between spaceships.

After a radiation burst, these two ships got lost in space without enough fuel to return home. Their only way out is to work together to get through the wormholes... but it seems that they don't get along very well.
